https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z0FaFQyAJQpl0tGGTqoBD9yQt5o.jpg Dawn Goldie is a painter who seemingly has the perfect life. Thriving gallery, loving husband Alex, and adorable 2 year old son Lennox; but the tragic death of her best friend Cori two years prior still plagues her. On her birthday, Dawn mistakenly receives a mysterious gift, a novel, which immediately captivates her attention. Dear Best Friend
